questions.question_text: What are two valid options for iterating through each Account in the collection List<Account> named AccountList? (Choose two.)

A Next Best Action strategy uses an Enhance Element that invokes an Apex method to determine a discount level for a Contact, based on a number of factors.

What is the correct definition of the Apex method?

choices.A: The record will be created and no error will be reported.
choices.C: The record will be created and a message will be in the debug log.
choices.D: The record will not be created and an exception will be thrown.
choices.B: The record will not be created and no error will be reported.

comments.content: Variable 'a' is not null, its empty Account. And in everything else you're right

When the AllorNone value is set to false, no error is returned when there's partial sucess or actually even if no records are inserted at all. Here since Account a is null, nothing can be inserted, but since that parameter is set to false, no error is reported.

See: https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.apexref.meta/apexref/apex_methods_system_database.htm#apex_System_Database_insert

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers decides to use exclusively declarative development to build out a new Salesforce application.

Which three options should be used to build out the database layer for the application? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BDE
the response is BDE

B, D, E
https://trailhead.salesforce.com/content/learn/modules/apex_patterns_sl/apex_patterns_sl_soc
"Database Layer
Declarative: Custom Objects, Fields, Relationships, Rollups
Coding: Apex Triggers"
b, d, e https://trailhead.salesforce.com/content/learn/modules/apex_patterns_sl/apex_patterns_sl_soc "Database Layer Declarative: Custom Objects, Fields, Relationships, Rollups Coding: Apex Triggers"

questions.question_text:
Given the following trigger implementation:

//IMG//


The developer receives deployment errors every time a deployment is attempted from a sandbox to Production.

What should the developer do to ensure a successful deployment?

choices.D: Ensure the deployment is validated by a System Admin user on Production.
choices.B: Ensure BUSINESS_RECORDTYPEID is pushed as part of the deployment components.
choices.C: Ensure BUSINESS_RECORDTYPEID is retrieved using Schema.Describe calls.
choices.A: Ensure a record type with an ID of BUSINESS_RECORDTYPEID exists on Production prior to deployment.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Anwer should be C, A will not work and fail on every other environment

Selected Answer: A
Strange hardcoding example, I think 'A' is correct because what is 'Schema.Describe calls'? You shoud use getRecordTypeInfosByName(), then get the required recordType Id

Selected Answer: A
Not sure how answer B can be implemented, Answer should be A
